thread.title: Technology Executive Casey Eichler Joins eSUB Board of Directors and Upcoming Product Releases Signal a Bright Forecast for eSUB

author: cnbc.com
title: Technology Executive Casey Eichler Joins eSUB Board of Directors and Upcoming Product Releases Signal a Bright Forecast for eSUB
text:
SAN DIEGO, Feb. 26, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- eSUB Construction Software, a leading provider of mobile and cloud-based project management and document control solutions for subcontractors, forecasts another year of incredible revenue growth and expanded market share. Upcoming product releases and the appointment of Casey Eichler to its board of directors are key factors contributing to the optimism for 2018.
The eSUB management team is delighted to welcome Casey Eichler to its board of directors. Mr. Eichler's background includes executive leadership and financial management roles with public and private companies including Ultra Clean Technology, Credence Systems Corporation, MarketTools, MIPS Technologies, Visigenic Software, NeXT Software and Microsoft. During his recent tenure as President and Chief Financial Officer of Ultra Clean Technologies, Mr. Eichler drove the company to achieve an annualized run rate approaching $1 billion through a combination of organic growth and strategic acquisitions.
"Throughout my career, I've had the privilege of working with exceptionally talented and passionate individuals and am excited about the opportunity to work with the eSUB Management Team, led by Wendy Rogers and Benny Baltrotsky," says Casey Eichler. "With their industry expertise combined with the need to deliver solutions for subcontractors to manage their growing business, eSUB is well positioned to achieve its aggressive growth goals and a dominant market position."
Additional excitement for 2018 revolves around the upcoming release of eSUB Time . Scheduled for release within the next quarter, eSUB Time expands on eSUB's current time card management capabilities by offering customers the ability for individual employees to clock in and clock out. Moreover, the eSUB team is focused on developing integrations between eSUB Project Management's solution and other construction technology applications. These integrations are critical to improve workflow and collaboration of the entire project lifecycle among all internal and external project stakeholders.
"At the beginning of every year I'm energized about the opportunity to increase our reach and help the hardworking subcontractors in construction," says Wendy Rogers, President and CEO of eSUB Construction Software. "Our product development is focused on major product initiatives that will help them deliver more projects quicker and at a lower cost. Our board of directors plays an important role in guiding us to expand our reach quickly. Casey's depth of leadership experience combined with his operational background is a valued addition, and we are thrilled to have someone of his caliber on our team. eSUB has had great success and continues to grow every year, but we are just getting started."
Mr. Eichler joins David Golden and Bobby Ocampo from Revolution, Sheldon Lewis from The Investor Group, and Brad Rogers from Vitec on eSUB's Board of Directors.
About eSUB
Founded and headquartered in San Diego, CA, eSUB is the leader of web-based project management and document control software designed specifically for subcontractors in the construction industry. Built on thirty-plus years of expertise, eSUB's easy-to-use, software-as-a-service helps self-performing contractors increase standardization, accountability, and productivity.
Today, thousands of users trust eSUB's platform to manage project communication and collaboration on construction projects worldwide. For more information or to schedule a free online demonstration visit www.eSUB.com or call 1.800.493.3782.
Contact: Tyler Riddell, Vice President of Marketing, tylerr@esub.com
